inlineContent.text: Get up and running in a few minutes with our drop-in turn-by-turn navigation
, or build a completely custom turn-by-turn navigation app with our core components for routing and navigation

abstract.text: The Navigation UIKit framework provides the ready-to-use drop-in turn-by-turn navigation UI.
A view controller that displays the current maneuver instruction as a “banner” flush with the edges of the
containing view. The user swipes to one side to preview a subsequent maneuver.
A cache consists of both in-memory and on-disk components, both of which can be reset.
A view that displays a speed limit and resembles a real-world speed limit sign.
The standard navigation style is the default style for Mapbox Navigation SDK.
Determines whether the style manager should apply a new style given the time of day.
A struct that defines the configuration of the cancel preview action in CarPlay.

give the user a control the cancel the navigation session.

navigation view.
The label to display navigation instructions.

is a user interface for the preview mode experience. It allows to present
banners that contain information that is important for the user before actually starting turn-by-turn
navigation session (e.g. final destination presentation, main and alternative routes preview etc).
